category: Safety and Health Management Regulations/Article 21 (Establishment and implementation of safety management responsibility plan)
contents: Article 21 (Establishment and implementation of safety management responsibility plan) ① The chairman of the board shall establish a safety management responsibility plan for the following year by December 31 of each year., ② The safety management responsibility plan under paragraph 1 includes the following contents. 1. Safety management activity performance and evaluation of the previous year, 2. Safety and health policy and safety management activity plan, 3. Safety organization composition, personnel and roles, 4. Safety-related facilities and budget, 5. Industrial accidents and safety Accident reduction goals, 6. Other safety management plans, ③ The Chairman establishes a safety management responsibility plan after consultation with the Minister of Health and Welfare and confirms it with approval from the Board of Directors. ④ The Chairman of the Board establishes a safety management responsibility plan of the previous year. The implementation status must be periodically inspected, and the implementation performance of the previous year's safety management responsibility plan must be inspected by the Minister of Health and Welfare by January 31 of each year., ⑤ All workers of the Corporation must faithfully implement the safety management responsibility plan., [ Full revision 2021. 12. 22.]
